title: Change Someone
text:
He’s mad
So I’m madder
He’s right
But that doesn’t matter

Get your head in here kid
Sometimes the only way
To change someone else
Is by changing yourself

Why is everyone mad at me?

Get your head in here kid
Sometimes the only way
To change someone else
Is by changing yourself

If you left it up to me
I’d say it’s all up to you
It’s really nothing new
